name: Possession - #7DFPS
description:
Hi, welcome to my #7DFPS Game Jam entry.

The game plays on the idea of using Enemy characters as tools to survive.

By possessing them you gain access to their weapons and position, allowing you to strike deep into the heart of the mysterious Z-Corp (spoilers!).

TIP: Main mechanic - Right click hold over another individual, they will start to sparkle. Whilst doing this press E and you will Possess them.

Your aim is to get the Pink character you initially control to the end of the map without being killed. Escape into the Green Lit room in the enemy base.

There is no You Died screen currently, you just get taken back to the initial loading screen. 

LINUX and MacOS builds to follow shortly.
